title: Subpart 130-1 - Awards of Costs and Imposition of Financial Sanctions for Frivolous Conduct in Civil Litigation
content:
Subpart 130-1 - Awards of Costs and Imposition of Financial Sanctions for Frivolous Conduct in Civil Litigation

State Regulations
§ 130-1.1 - Costs; sanctions
§ 130-1.1a - Signing of papers
§ 130-1.2 - Order awarding costs or imposing sanctions
§ 130-1.3 - Payment of sanctions
§ 130-1.4 - Application to officers other than judges of the courts of the Unified Court System
§ 130-1.5 - Exception

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
